EmailTemplate.subject: Win A Phantom 2 Vision Plus RC Drone With VMTurbo 5.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Try VMTurbo 5.0 Free for 30 Days Out-of-the-Box Control: - Deploy in 15 Minutes - Specific Sizing, Placement, Configuration Decisions in 1 Hour - Single Click Execution - Control up to 10,000 VMs - Download to win a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000-decisions&utm_content=120514> {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, Last month, we announced the launch of VMTurbo 5.0 <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-release-5?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=120514>, the biggest release since the company's founding in 2009. Version 5.0 extends control to Network, VDI, Hybrid Cloud, Applications, and Docker Containers. Yes, Containers. As a celebration of the complete control VMTurbo offers IT admins, architects, and engineers, we're giving away 1 Phantom 2 Vision+ RC Drone every month until our next release. Click below to learn more on how to win. Win The Phantom <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000-decisions&utm_content=120514> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
